summary: Action required: a custom alert is paging Red Hat
description: Your cluster requires you to take action. The custom alert '${ALERT_NAME}' is firing and paging Red Hat's SRE team. Please ensure Alert Routing is correctly configured to not page Red Hat for custom alerts. See: https://docs.redhat.com/en/documentation/red_hat_openshift_service_on_aws/4/html/monitoring/enabling-alert-routing-for-user-defined-projects
